articles.author: Noah Sheidlower
articles.title: America's oldest workers can't retire. Here's how they're getting by. - Business Insider
articles.description: For America's oldest workers, retirement isn't possible. Workers in their 80s live paycheck to paycheck, use Social Security, and dip into savings.
articles.content:
After a tedious week of squinting at spreadsheets, Sandy McConnell, 80, makes her way to a restaurant in Nevada for a monthly lunch with former colleagues.
"Life is too freaking short," McConnell re… [+12310 chars]
